QuestData.Title: Dragon, Unchained
QuestData.Description: Lirastrasza is the last and greatest of the red dragons that the Twilight's Hammer captured. They're about to kill her, $c.$B$BYou need to take the Elementium Axe and free her from her bonds before they do.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Use the Elementium Axe to unchain her!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Elementium Axe to break the chains enslaving Lirastrasza.
QuestData.CompletionText: All you have to do is use the axe to break Lirastrasza's chains.
QuestData.RewardText: Isn't she beautiful? So graceful.$B$BI hope she gets her fill of revenge and then some.
